Package a3

Class BeeNear

java.lang.Object
tage.ai.behaviortrees.BTBehavior
tage.ai.behaviortrees.BTCondition
a3.BeeNear
public class BeeNear extends BTCondition
BeeNear is a behavior-tree condition that checks if the bee NPC is within a specified radius of the player's avatar (rabbit).

It evaluates to true when the distance between the bee and the player is less than or equal to the given threshold.

Author:
Isabel Santoyo-Garcia

    • BeeNear

      public BeeNear(NPCcontroller c, NPC b, float radius, boolean toNegate)
      Constructs a BeeNear condition.
      Parameters:
      c - the NPCcontroller managing AI behaviors and state
      b - the NPC instance representing the bee
      radius - the maximum distance for the condition to evaluate true
      toNegate - if true, the boolean result will be inverted
